page.title: 06SWAFFHAM MARKET PLACE
page.content: The market place is a large car park in the middle of the town and is used for setting up market stalls as well.The main attraction of the market place is the Butter Cross with its statue of Ceres on top. The whole market place and its roads around it have been completly resurfaced.Bins and little black posts have been set around the Butter Cross because cars were parking around it and were damaging the cobble surface. The market stalls sell jeans,jumpers,foam,flowers,fruit, vegetables,sheets,antiques and there is also an auction. Each market stall has their own place marked out.On the side that Dave Boy Greens shop is there are some more market stalls.On this side there is also a meat stall,the meat from here is just as good as the meat in shops.
